thread.title: X Factor 2015: Cheryl Fernandez-Versini gets protective over Nick Grimshaw
thread.title_full: X Factor 2015: Cheryl Fernandez-Versini gets protective over Nick Grimshaw

title: X Factor 2015: Cheryl Fernandez-Versini gets protective over Nick Grimshaw
text:
X Factor 2015: Cheryl Fernandez-Versini gets protective over Nick Grimshaw X Factor 2015: Cheryl Fernandez-Versini gets protective over Nick Grimshaw 
Press Association 2014 / / National Entertainment News Share 
Nick Grimshaw has revealed how his fellow X Factor judge Cheryl Fernandez-Versini has been a caring friend since he joined the show. 
The BBC Radio 1 DJ, who replaced Louis Walsh after his 11-year stint as judge, said the Girls Aloud star always checks up if he is fine. 
He told the Daily Mirror how Cheryl was concerned with the criticism he received when he first signed on, saying: “Cheryl said, ‘What about me going on after Sharon Osbourne? Famously amazing and crazy good at doing TV?’ She was more upset than me when I spoke to her about it. 
“She’s been very caring to me and welcoming and she phones me all the time and checks up on me.” 
Cheryl has also been warning Grimmy that the negative comments look set to continue throughout the series. 
“She was like, ‘Just you wait. Everyone gets it on this show.’ I was like, ‘Louis Walsh doesn’t like me!’ and Cheryl was like: ‘Please’,” the music DJ continued. 
Nick said he “kind of expected” the negative reaction. Share article 
“There’s always scrutiny when things change. Coming on after Louis, who’s been awesome for 11 years, and a national treasure, that’s big shoes to fill,” he added. Promoted Stories
